divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to meet my cousin, and while walking thru a field i looked up andsaw stars moving. There were 4 small points and 1 large. The large one firedsomething at 1 of the small ones which grew britter then winked out. 1 of thesmall ones fired at another small 1 near the big 1, which got hit then veredaway. The big 1 started firing at the other ones then all started winking out.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grants
There were no other sightings in Grants on or around July 2nd 1993
